Name: Ba-122
Sentence: The Ba-122 pnictide family, which is currently the most promising compound for high current applications among the iron based superconductors , is well-suited for our studies since (a) it exhibits a significant upper critical field (B c2 ) anisotropy and (b) crystals which are rather clean (K-doped Ba-122) or have pronounced intrinsic impurities (Co-doped Ba-122) are available.

Name: Ba-122
Sentence: We start with the pristine K-doped Ba-122 single crystal (T c onset = 38.2 K).
